title: Am I the only one who still missed old Fiora's artwork/model?

replies.body: When the reworked happen, everyone was begging for the old model/artwork, so it's not just you... it's just that you're going to get ignored by riot like they did lol
I like the old look but the new look feels more cleancut and fierce

The visual part of the update actually made Fiora feel more like a champion to me. She looks and feels much more unique now, in my opinion.

There was something about her previous design that always gave off an _"I've seen it before"_ kind of feeling (and it wasn't the good kind, with all of my respect to Eoin Colgan and the team).

There was always something about Fiora that just didn't feel right to me, and the update definitely fixed that thing (again, at least for me).
on a planet with over 7 billion people you are never the only person to think something, ever.

> [{quoted}](name=thacrazytaco,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WoenwrcU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-09T18:18:08.172+0000)
>
> on a planet with over 7 billion people you are never the only person to think something, ever.

But, but, what about special snowflakes? :P
